law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 28, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008; and ch. 179, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 127, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 1.
